lead_paragraph: Coming off the fastest elimination win in the history of the Meadowlands Pace, the undefeated Somebeachsomewhere was made the overwhelming favorite for this weekend’s $1.1 million race. Somebeachsomewhere, who will be driven by Paul MacDonell, was made the 2-5 favorite in the morning line to win his 11th straight race.
